text:
I found an issue related to the accessibility of HS forms. Multi-select properties, for some reason, add an an aria-labelledby of the parent. So rather than reading the options you are toggling on or off, every option is read as the parent.

Has anyone dealt with this?
Same is true of radio selects.

We can use some javascript to remove that attribute, which seems to work.

Is there any documentation or road map for known a11y issues like this?
